events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's value changes. You can pull out the new value by accessing `event.target.value` (string).
events.description_zh: 元素的值更改时调用的处理程序。您可以通过访问“event.target.value”（字符串）来提取新值。

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's value changes.
events.description_zh: 元素的值更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onClear
events.description: Handler that is called when the clear button is clicked.
events.description_zh: 单击清除按钮时调用的处理程序。

:label.description: The content to display as the label.

value.description: The current value of the input (controlled).

defaultValue.description: The default value of the input (uncontrolled).
defaultValue.description_zh: 输入的默认值（不受控制）。

:description.description: A description for the input. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.
:description.description_zh: 输入的说明。提供提示，例如选择内容的具体要求。

:errorMessage.description: An error message for the input.

:startContent.description: Element to be rendered in the left side of the input.
:startContent.description_zh: 要在输入左侧呈现的元素。

:endContent.description: Element to be rendered in the right side of the input.
:endContent.description_zh: 要在输入右侧呈现的元素。

fullWidth.description: Whether the input should take up the width of its parent.
fullWidth.description_zh: 输入是否应占用其父级的宽度。

isClearable.description: Whether the input should have a clear button.
isClearable.description_zh: 输入是否应具有清除按钮。

isRequired.description: Whether user input is required on the input before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 在提交表单之前，是否需要用户对输入进行输入。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the input can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 输入是否可以由用户选择但不能更改。

validationState.description: Whether the input should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.
validationState.description_zh: 输入是否应显示其“有效”或“无效”的视觉样式。（**已弃用**）请改用 **isInvalid**。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the input should be animated.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否应对输入进行动画处理。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the checkbox slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为复选框插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Input wrapper, it handles alignment, placement, and general appearance.
slots.description_zh: Input wrapper, it handles alignment, placement, and general appearance.

slots.name: label
slots.description: Label of the input, it is the one that is displayed above, inside or left of the input.
slots.description_zh: Label of the input, it is the one that is displayed above, inside or left of the input.

slots.name: mainWrapper
slots.description: Wraps the inputWrapper when position is outside / outside-left.
slots.description_zh: Wraps the inputWrapper when position is outside / outside-left.

slots.name: inputWrapper
slots.description: Wraps the label (when it is inside) and the innerWrapper.
slots.description_zh: Wraps the label (when it is inside) and the innerWrapper.

slots.name: innerWrapper
slots.description: Wraps the input, the startContent and the endContent.
slots.description_zh: Wraps the input, the startContent and the endContent.

slots.name: clearButton
slots.description: The clear button, it is at the end of the input.
slots.description_zh: The clear button, it is at the end of the input.

slots.name: helperWrapper
slots.description: Wraps the description and the errorMessage.
slots.description_zh: Wraps the description and the errorMessage.

slots.name: errorMessage
slots.description: The error message of the input.
slots.description_zh: The error message of the input.
